title: Is Indian philosophy is mother of all philosophies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don't know, what is meant by mother of all philiosophies. What I can say is, if you want an imagination along with visualization with precise rules and elaborate application! System that gives such an extensive thought and intensive memory management. That's Indian philiosophy. If you want to study depths of subject along with objective existence then IP gives you to explore infinity.
